synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process involved mixing lithium sulfide, sodium sulfite, and germanium sulfide powders, molding the composition into pellets, vacuum-sealing in a quartz tube at about 30 Pa, heating in a furnace to 700°C for 8 hours to obtain Li3.25Ge0.25P0.75S4, pulverizing the material in a vibrating mill, remolding into pellets, vacuum-sealing, heating to 550°C for 8 hours, and cooling to room temperature to produce a crystalline sulphide solid electrolyte material with the same composition.
